You are in fact forming anions and cations from chewing on the burger because the enzymes found in your mouth are capable of breaking down long chain macromolecules, which are further digested in your stomach and absorbed by your small intestine. So as you sit there reading this comment, you are in fact "forming" anions and cations and many other type of things.
